segments.text: I can't believe the boy is reaching into the cookie jar right now, standing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What was he thinking? Was it worth it just for a cookie?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister’s expression is one of eager anticipation, as she raises her hand toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something so mischievous about this whole scene, but I can't help but root for the little rascal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But at the same time, the risk of him falling makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if the woman finally looks up and sees this chaos?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish they would be more careful and consider the consequences of their actions.
segments.speaker: PAR
